comprehensive_overview: OPARI2 (OpenMP Parallelizer and Runtime Instrumentation) is a tool for the parallelization and instrumentation of OpenMP programs. It helps to analyze and optimize the performance of parallel codes that use OpenMP directives.
core_features: 1. Automatic parallelization of OpenMP codes. 2. Instrumentation for performance analysis. 3. Automatic generation of OpenMP regions. 4. Support for various analysis tools. 5. Integration with compilers and build systems.
